snippet: So far, Meryl Davis and Charlie White, world champion ice dancers, have not been able to break through the public consciousness and get endorsements.
abstract: Meryl Davis and Charlie White, the only American ice dancing team to ever win the world championships, have their eyes set on winning the gold at the 2014 Olympic Games in Russia, but first must come up with a marketing strategy that will put the American public solidly behind them.
lead_paragraph: So far, Meryl Davis and Charlie White, world champion ice dancers, have not been able to break through the public consciousness and get endorsements.

headline.seo: Meryl Davis and Charlie White Seek Olympic Gold in Russia in 2014. Will Endorsements Follow?
headline.main: Oh, to Bring ‘Gold’ Home, and Perhaps the Bacon
headline.print_headline: h, to Bring ‘Gold’ Home, And Perhaps the Bacon
